refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: gschema-compile compiles all the GSettings XML schema files in directory into a binary file with the name gschemas.compiled that can be used by #GSettings. The XML schema files must have the filename extension .gschema. For a detailed description of the XML file format, see the #GSettings documentation.

listitem.para: Store gschemas.compiled in TARGETDIR instead of directory.
Do not enforce restrictions on key names. Note that this option is purely to facility the transition from GConf, and will be removed at some time in the future.
